L7p:Detail.stringValue: DCR redirect_uris '${dcr_redirect_uris.result}' is not sub-set or equal to SSA redirect uris '${ssa_redirect_uris.result}'

L7p:entry.L7p:value: //MUST match or be a subset of the software_redirect_uris claim in the SSA If omitted, the entire contents of the software_redirect_uris element in the SSA are considered to be requested.

L7p:value.stringValue: //If specified, the software_id in the request MUST match the software_id specified in the SSA.

L7p:Detail.stringValue: DCR software_id ${dcr_software_id.result} did not match SSA software_id ${ssa_software_id.result}

L7p:Comment.stringValue: Add logic to extract if locale-specific values have been provided in the request
